mapper.select: SELECT /* SystemMapper.selectSystem, 시스템 정보 조회, 임근대/SK플래닛, 2014-02-20 */ A.SYSTEM_ID, A.TENANT_ID, A.SYSTEM_CD, A.SYSTEM_NM, A.STATUS_CD FROM TB_FW_SYSTEM A WHERE 1=1 AND A.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId}

SELECT /* SystemMapper.selectSystem, 시스템 정보 조회, 임근대/SK플래닛, 2014-02-20 */ A.SYSTEM_ID, B.IP FROM TB_FW_SYSTEM A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_FW_IP B ON A.SYSTEM_ID = B.SYSTEM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND B.IP = #{ip}
